channel.title: nlp on Haoming Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in nlp on Haoming Jiang

item.title: BOND is Accepted by KDD 2020
item.description: Our recent work on distantly supervised NER is accepted by KDD2020. We are closing the GAP between full supervision and no supervision! See our code here: https://github.com/cliang1453/BOND The reuslts (F1 score) are summerized as follows: Method CoNLL03 Tweet OntoNote5.0 Webpage Wikigold Full Supervision 91.21 52.19 86.20 72.39 86.43 Previous SOTA 76.00 26.10 67.69 51.39 47.54 BOND 81.48 48.

item.title: Two Papers are Accepted by ACL 2020
item.description: Two papers are accepted by ACL 2020! One is about multidomain NMT using word level mixing model. The other one is SMART model, leaderboad wining model on GLUE. Reference SMART: Robust and Efficient Fine-Tuning for Pre-trained Natural Language Models through Principled Regularized Optimization 2020 Haoming Jiang, Pengcheng He, Weizhu Chen, Xiaodong Liu, Jianfeng Gao and Tuo Zhao [arXiv] [Code] Annual Conference of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL), 2020 Multi-Domain Neural Machine Translation with Word-Level Adaptive Layer-wise Domain Mixing 2020 Haoming Jiang, Chen Liang, Chong Wang and Tuo Zhao [arXiv] Annual Conference of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL), 2020

item.title: State-of-the-art Results on GLUE Benchmark
item.description: Our recent collabrative work with Microsoft Dynamics 365 AI and Microsoft Research AI (paper, code) achieves state-of-the-art results in 5 of 9 GLUE benchmark tasks and an overall GLUE task performance 89.9, which outperforms all existing models. The reuslts are summerized as follows: Method CoLA SST MRPC STS-B QQP MNLI-m/mm QNLI RTE WNLI AX Score #params Previous SOTA 70.8 97.1 91.9/89.2 92.
